welcome_message_body: Welcome to Moncton, Canada, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, diverse culinary scene, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Pâtisserie Tony's Pastries
restaurants.description: Pâtisserie Tony's Pastries is a bakery located in Moncton.

restaurants.name: Igloo Beverage Room & Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Igloo Beverage Room & Steakhouse is a restaurant located in Moncton.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Moncton.

restaurants.name: Cafe Clementine
restaurants.description: Cafe Clementine is a café located in Moncton.

restaurants.name: Calactus cafe restaurant
restaurants.description: Calactus cafe restaurant is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Moncton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Moncton International Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim areas, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Greater Moncton International Airport serves all domestic flights within Canada.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Greater Moncton International Airport serves all international flights and provides customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
